item.title: Murmur
item.description: Murmur is a decentralized social media platform that supports free, censorship-resistant and rewarding microblogging.

item.title: Murmur | About
item.description: Murmur is a blockchain-based social media platform that enables open, free and rewarding microblogging experiences.

item.title: Murmur | Airdrop
item.description: Download the Murmur app and be among the first to receive EOS token MUR. Redeem MUR for in-app purchases and payments.

item.title: Murmur | Vision
item.description: Murmur gives back the power to the people and empowers them to control their own social media experiences and personal data.

item.title: Murmur | Team
item.description: Get to know the team behind Murmur - a revolutionary microblogging platform that allows users to control their personal data and social media experiences.
